==== Ubuntu Women ====
* Tara Oldfield prepared transcript for UDS-N UW Interviews:
** Video: <nowiki>[[http://vimeo.com/20317311]]</nowiki>
** Transcript: <nowiki>[[http://blog.novacut.com/2011/03/women-at-uds-n-transcript.html]]</nowiki>
* Melissa created <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-women-ops|ubuntu-women-ops team on Launchpad]]</nowiki> for better tracking of channel ops
* Team meeting <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20110310|March 10th]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/issue-47/|Full Circle Magazine, Issue #47]]</nowiki> with interview of Ubuntu Member Flavia Weisghizzi
* Penelope Stowe appointed to the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-membership-board-americas/+members|Americas Regional Membership board]]</nowiki>
* Of the 632 Ubuntu Members at the end of this month 5.06% are women
